ComicInfo.Summary:
Still reeling from the curse of the Mummy Tramp, Angel Lynch and friends have little time to recover in Africa, as a more powerful danger emerges - the mythical Blood Diamond! This deadly relic unleashes a threat unlike any seen on this Earth, something no human - or zombie - can contain! Part one of the four-part story begins here!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Marco Maccagni | 1 | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Marco Maccagni | 2 | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Michael McComb | 3 | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Michael McComb | 4 | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Andrew Herman | 5 | F | Risqué Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Andrew Herman | 6 |
